Name: Adelaide
Motto:
"Ut Prosint Omnibus Conjuncti"
"United for the Common Weal"
Complement:
1922: 33 officers and 450 sailors
1941: 26 officers and 436 sailors
Armament:
Original configuration:
9 × 6-inch (152-mm) Mk XII guns
1 × 3-inch (76-mm) anti-aircraft gun
1 × 12-pounder (3-inch) 8-cwt field gun
4 × 3-pounder saluting guns
10 × .303-inch machine guns
2 × 21-inch (530 mm) torpedo tubes
2 × depth charge chutes
Armour: 3-inch (7.6 cm) side armour-belt over midships section
